# currentPath

**Instance Property**

The current evaluated path for the session’s [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSession/resolvedEndpoint] property.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentPath: NWPath? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use Key-Value Observing (KVO) to watch for changes to this property. For information about KVO, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/KeyValueObserving/KeyValueObserving.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000177i].

## Getting session properties

- **endpoint**: The destination endpoint with which this session was created.
